short_summary: The National Research Council Canada is seeking quotations to Acquire an Electric Vertical Elevator Mast.
description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking to acquire one (1) Electric vertical elevator mast to be better suited to the tasks associated with the installation of the M59 large-scale wall oven.
duration_in_months: There are 40 days of this contract. Beyond the proprietary data there is not further information to ensure this properly.
tags: Forklift or elevator accessories or supplies
full_summary:
================



### Acquisition of Electric Vertical Elevator Mast



#### Competition Notice 



**Amendment Number:** 9
**Publication Date:** October 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2023, 2:00 p.m.
**Amendment Date:** November 10, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date:** November 17, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** February 15, 2024



#### Tender Overview 



The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites submissions for a Request for Proposals (RFP) to acquire one (1) Electric vertical elevator mast. The contracting entity is responding to a variety of applications and intends to acquire a suitable product for their needs.



#### Tender Information 



*   **Contract Category:** Canada-wide
*   **Request Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Ottawa, Canada, National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Stéphane Lajoie
    *   stephane.lajoie@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
    *   (514) 210-7395



#### Tender Documents 



The following documents are available on the Canada Business Network (cbiu.gc.ca) website under the procurement notice 23-58133:



*   Q&A/QR (RFP)
*   Addendum 1
*   Notice of Proposed Procurement - APM
*   Q&A/QR 1
*   Q&A/QR 3
*   RFP - Acquisition Electric Vertical Elevator Mast
*   DDPP (RFP) - Acquisition Elevateur Électrique à Mat Vertical



#### Notes 



*   All offers must be submitted electronically through the CBIU's Secure Electronic Tender Delivery (COMB-72-D00723LOH) tool.
*   Offers must be submitted no later than the tender closing date. Late offers will not be considered.
*   Bidders are responsible for ensuring their offers are complete and accurately priced.



**Important:** The RFP submission deadline has expired, and this procurement is no longer open to new suppliers.



#### Related Documents
